alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 2:55AM MST until December 01 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 0 to 2 inches from 6500 to 7500 feet. Higher amounts of 2 to 5 inches above 7500 feet. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard, and Williams. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Hazardous travel conditions could impact the morning commute, including along and near the I-17 and I-40 corridor. Additional snow forecast from 2 AM Today to 11 PM Today: Doney Park 0 to 1 inches Flagstaff 0 to 1 inches Forest Lakes 2 to 4 inches Heber-Overgaard 0 to 1 inches Williams 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim
